name: World of Mirrors
description:
A small platformer that follows the adventure of an unnamed individual and their travels through the other side of the coin. 

Controls:

Spacebar: Jump

TAB: Projectile Wheel

Left Mouse Button: FIre

WASD: Movement

Exit game: "END" or " ` "

Hotkeys:

1: Force

2: Freeze

3: Breaching

4: Light
